answers.answer: Good luck!! I have diabetes and also am gonna get my tubes tied so most likely I'll be getting induced too, if all goes well and he doesn't wanna make an early appearance Lol. 94 days to go. Times going so slow

I have 33 days left to go and want this baby out already so I could meet and hold her..
I have 9 days left. Tomorrow I get checked to see if my body has dilated. Wish me luck. Lol lord knows I am done!!!!

48 days left. I m want this baby come out soon

44 days. In the UK we've had insane heat and I just can't handle being preggers anymore and running round after a toddler! I feel like such a creeper sweetbee3, I always come  across your posts! Keep us updated and let us know how labour goes, hope the GD isn't too rough! x
Jealous! 139 days still left for me.

question: 69 days left! Woot! I have been so excited,  impatient.  But now that my due date is coming up I'm feeling a little stressed,  making sure we have everything ready for her! I meet with my Dr on the 28 to set a date to be induced.  So the date will actually be closer: -/ have to get induced due to GD.  How much longer for you mama's?
title: 69 days!
